mapper.update:
update game_data_statics
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tournament_times = #{tournamentTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
winner1_times = #{winner1Times,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and tournament_type= #{tournamentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update game_data_statics set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tournament_times = #{tournamentTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, winner1_times = #{winner1Times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, winner2_times = #{winner2Times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, winner3_times = #{winner3Times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stageb_times = #{stagebTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, round_times = #{roundTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, round_win_times = #{roundWinTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, round_lose_times = #{roundLoseTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_unfinished = #{tournamentUnfinished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_type= #{tournamentType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
